TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DomainController extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer

Docs.summary: The DomainController class represents a domain controller in an Active Directory domain.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CheckReplicationConsistency() cil managed

Docs.summary: Uses the Knowledge Consistency Checker (KCC) to verify the replication topology for this domain controller.
Gets the current date and time from this domain controller.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime"> object that contains the current date and time from this domain controller.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: Determines if the managed resources should be released. `true` if the managed resources are released; otherwise, `false`.
Docs.summary: Causes the object to release all managed and/or unmanaged resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The parameter affects only the release of the managed resources. The unmanaged resources are always released by this method.

Docs.summary: Gets the domain that this domain controller is a member of.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> object that represents the domain that this domain controller is a member of.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog EnableGlobalCatalog() cil managed

Docs.summary: Promotes this domain controller to a global catalog server.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog"> object that represents the global catalog server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog.DisableGlobalCatalog%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is used to demote the domain controller from a global catalog server.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

Docs.summary: Overrides the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection FindAll(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search. The target of this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object is the name of the domain that will be searched for domain controllers.
Docs.summary: Finds all domain controllers in the specified context.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection"> object that contains the domain controllers found by the search.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection FindAll (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string siteName);

Docs.summary: Finds all domain controllers in the specified context and site.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection"> object that contains the domain controllers that were found by the search.

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search.
Docs.summary: Finds a single domain controller in the specified context.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"> object that represents the domain controller that was found by the search.

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search.
A combination of one or more of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.LocatorOptions"> members that defines the type of domain controller to find.
Docs.summary: Finds a single domain controller in the specified context, allowing for additional search options.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"> object that represents the domain controller that was found by the search.

Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"> object that represents the domain controller that was found.

Docs.summary: Retrieves a list of the replication connection failures recorded by this domain controller.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationFailureCollection"> object that contains the replication connection failures that were recorded by this domain controller.

Docs.summary: Retrieves the replication cursor information for the specified partition.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationCursorCollection"> that contains the replication cursor information.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationOperationInformation GetReplicationOperationInformation() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves the current and pending replication operations for this domain controller.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationOperationInformation"> object that contains the current and pending replication operations.

Docs.summary: Gets the highest update sequence number that has been committed to this domain controller.
Docs.value: The highest update sequence number (USN) that has been committed to this domain controller.

Docs.summary: Gets the inbound replication connections for this domain controller.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnectionCollection"> object that contains the inbound replication connections for this domain controller.

Docs.summary: Gets the IP address of this domain controller.
Docs.value: The Internet protocol (IP) address of this domain controller in string form.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsGlobalCatalog() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines if this domain controller is a global catalog server.
Docs.returns: `true` if this domain controller is a global catalog server or `false` otherwise.

Docs.summary: Gets the operating system version of this domain controller.
Docs.value: The version of the operating system that is in use on this domain controller.

Docs.summary: Gets the outbound replication connections for this domain controller.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnectionCollection"> object that contains the outbound replication connections for this domain controller.

Docs.summary: Gets the roles that this domain controller serves.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryRoleCollection"> object that contains a collection of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryRole> members that indicate the roles that this domain controller serves.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SeizeRoleOwnership(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryRole role) cil managed

Docs.param: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryRole"> members that specifies which role the domain controller should take ownership of.
Docs.summary: Causes this domain controller to take ownership of the specified role.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is a destructive operation because it causes the role to be taken without the cooperation of the server that currently holds the role. The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController.TransferRoleOwnership%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method should be used instead whenever possible.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the site that this domain controller belongs to.
Docs.value: The name of the site that this domain controller belongs to.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the synchronization delegate for this domain controller.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncUpdateCallback"> delegate that will be used for synchronization notifications.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void SyncReplicaFromAllServers (string partition, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOptions options);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void SyncReplicaFromAllServers(string partition, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOptions options) cil managed

Docs.param: The distinguished name of the partition for the domain controller to synchronize.
A combination of one or more of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOptions"> members.
Docs.summary: Causes this domain controller to synchronize the specified partition with all other domain controllers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks By default, the replication will only occur with the other domain controllers in the same site. If the parameter contains the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOptions> value, then the replication will occur with all domain controllers in the forest.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void SyncReplicaFromServer (string partition, string sourceServer);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void SyncReplicaFromServer(string partition, string sourceServer) cil managed

Docs.param: The distinguished name of the partition with which to synchronize the domain controller.
The name of the server with which to synchronize the partition.
Docs.summary: Causes this domain controller to synchronize the specified partition with the specified domain controller.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void TransferRoleOwnership(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryRole role) cil managed

Docs.param: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryRole"> members that specifies which role will be transferred to this domain controller.
Docs.summary: Causes ownership of the specified role to be transferred to this domain controller.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void TriggerSyncReplicaFromNeighbors(string partition) cil managed

Docs.param: The distinguished name of the partition to synchronize.
Docs.summary: Begins a synchronization of the specified partition.
